data.text: How will the gold be tarnished,
The precious sons of Zion,
Nay, serpents have drawn out the breasts,
The tongue of the sucking child
They that feed on dainties
And the iniquity of the daughter of my people has been increased
Her Nazirites were made purer than snow,
Their countenance is become blacker than smoke;
The slain with the sword were better
The hands of tenderhearted women
The Lord has accomplished his wrath;
The kings of the earth,
For the sins of her prophets,
Her watchmen staggered in the streets,
Depart ye from the unclean ones:
The presence of the Lord was their portion;
While we yet lived our eyes failed,
We have hunted for our little ones,
Our pursuers were swifter than the eagles of the sky,
The breath of our nostrils, our anointed Lord,
Rejoice and be glad, O daughter of Edom,
O daughter of Zion, thine iniquity has come to an end;
